description: A mobile suit used exclusively by the Earth Federation`s ECOAS special forces. It is relatively small for a mobile suit, and can change into a tank form. It can also function as a field headquarters and has a variety of sensors and communications equipment. The Loto was developed by the Strategic Naval Research Institute (SNRI), and its operating data will be used for the development of future miniaturized mobile suits.
name: D-50C Loto
